name: Larry Bain's Adaptation Of His Grandmother's Haroseth
keywords: brandy, dried fruit, nuts, kosher, raw, spring
recipeIngredient: 3 whole apples, peeled, cored and quartered
2 tablespoons matzoh meal, or as needed

recipeInstructions.text: Using the steel blade of a food processor or other chopper, chop very fine, but not to a paste, the walnuts, apricots, prunes, dates, apples and orange. This may be done in batches, if necessary.
Add the wine, brandy, cinnamon, cloves, nutmeg and lime juice. If necessary, add matzoh meal to make a mortarlike consistency.
